title: About Me
line1: I'm Martin Vékony, a 22 year old computer science engineering student at Obuda University John Von Neumann Faculty of Informatics.
line2: I'm currently working at BKV Zrt. M4 Hírközlési Szakszolgálat, where I participate internal software developing.
line3: Moreover, I am instructor at Logiscool, where I teach secondary school students for programming C# language and develop game with a Unity engine.
line4: In my free time, I like to work on personal projects using React, C#, Java and Unity
